articles.author: Kaitlin Sullivan
articles.title: American Cancer Society recommends self-swab HPV test for cervical cancer screening - NBC News
articles.description: Cervical cancer screening can now include “self-swab” HPV tests, according to updated guidelines published Thursday by the American Cancer Society.
articles.content:
Cervical cancer screening can now include self-swab HPV tests, according to updated guidelines published Thursday by the American Cancer Society. 
The change, experts hope, will encourage more women… [+5348 chars]
